mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts(title, post_type, anonymous, user_id, content, category_id, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{postType}, #{anonymous}, #{authorId}, #{content}, #{categoryId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, category_id = #{categoryId}, modified_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{noticeId};
mapper.select: SELECT p.id id, p.title title, u.id author_id, u.nickname author_nickname, p.anonymous anonymous, p.content content, p.views views, p.likes likes, p.answer_count answer_count, p.category_id category_id, p.created_at created_at, p.modified_at modified_at FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.id = #{noticeId};

SELECT p.id id, p.title title, p.anonymous anonymous, p.user_id author_id, u.nickname author_nickname, p.views views, p.likes likes, p.category_id category_id, p.answer_count answer_count, p.created_at created_at, p.modified_at modified_at FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = p.user_id WHERE p.deleted_at IS NULL AND p.post_type = 0
AND p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND p.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};
